review: As a Amazon Prime member, I am very glad that I purchased Amazon Fire TV.  Picture and sound quality is great and it was ridiculously easy to install.  Now, I am wishing and waiting for more movies and TV shows----The Hunger Games and Major Crimes on TNT for example, to be made available for Prime members at no additional charge.  Still, there is an almost infinite variety of programming to watch. An added perk is the Cloud feature which allows me to view my cell photos on the HD TV.  I think I'm in love...
author: Red Stone

review: I like this a lot, it is very fast and if you are all in on Amazon as I am then it is all good.  Except:  I have had to unplug this and reboot 3-4 times already in less than a month.  What happens?  The lips move with no sound,  an app you close in the back round just starts back up, when I first installed I immediately had to call customer service to walk me through how to get a video to play.  Luckily Amazon's customer service is excellent. Just seems buggy.
